constraints.name: monotonic_decreasing
constraints.description: 序列中的元素必须单调递减（即后一个元素的值不大于前一个元素的值）

constraints.name: adjustment_constraint
constraints.description: 只有大于当前阈值的元素可以被调整为该阈值
constraints.formal: ∀ j, if S[j] > Q[i], then S[j] = Q[i]

constraints.name: sum_invariant
constraints.description: 调整后的序列和必须保持不变，即调整操作不影响总和
constraints.formal: sum(S) = sum(S') where S' is the adjusted sequence
